item.title: Merry Christmas from Beer & Brewer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: A quick note to say that Beer & Brewer will now be taking an extended Christmas break. We’ll be back with more beer news and reviews in 2024. In the meantime, we’d like to wish you all a very merry Christmas and a happy New Year! If you’re looking for things to do over the ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
A quick note to say that Beer & Brewer will now be taking an extended Christmas break. We’ll be back with more beer news and reviews in 2024.

In the meantime, we’d like to wish you all a very merry Christmas and a happy New Year!

If you’re looking for things to do over the Christmas break, you could do worse than pick up yourselves a copy of our latest issue from your local newsagent. Or try the beers made by some of our 2023 Beer & Brewer Awards winners.

Merry Christmas to you too! Whether you’re enjoying a festive craft brew or spending time with loved ones, I hope your holiday season is filled with joy, relaxation, and of course, some great beer. Cheers from Beer & Brewer!
